headline.print_headline: Islanders Fall to a Resurgent Sidney Crosby and the Penguins
headline.main: Islanders Fall to a Resurgent Sidney Crosby and the Penguins

snippet: Crosby scored two power-play goals as the Islanders lost against a divisional opponent in regulation for the first time this season.
lead_paragraph: Crosby scored two power-play goals as the Islanders lost against a divisional opponent in regulation for the first time this season.
